text: @LeaderHoyer @HouseJudiciary @FSCDems Thank you for the kind wishes, @LeaderHoyer!

Seventy-eight years ago, American service members stormed the beaches of Normandy.

When we think of #DDay and look at photos of those men approaching the shore, we are moved by the sheer magnitude of their bravery.

We will never forget their service and sacrifice for peace. https://t.co/FPFAGUaGNV

The horrific gun violence in Philly has rocked our communities. I mourn for those killed, injured, and traumatized.

No dispute should end in a gun fight. No Saturday should end in carnage.

Congress will continue to work on concrete ways to reduce gun deaths. 

We must act.

On #GunViolenceAwarenessDay, I stood with @CeaseFirePA and local leaders to demand action to end gun violence.

We cannot grow numb to this horror. https://t.co/PfajZbrjPM

Like so many of you, I am outraged by the plague of gun violence in our nation.

Every lawmaker must act to saves lives — We could not have a more important job to do. https://t.co/Q2Y4DUdPLd

Kicked off #Pride2022 with a flag raising at Lower Gwynedd Township.

This month is a time to lift up our LGBTQ+ community — and recommit ourselves to a more equal and inclusive nation. https://t.co/cRWEGjXcgV

In 2021, my team worked with @SecRaimondo to help the American Keg Co. secure U.S. steel and avoid closure.

It was a pleasure to get a closer look into their business, meet with their staff, and lift up American manufacturing.

Cheers to their great work in our community! https://t.co/u4oXf4wcYb

Thank you for your visit to Pottstown, @SecRaimondo!

Delighted to spend the day discussing the impressive work of the American Keg Company — the only keg manufacturer in the U.S. — and the possibilities of American manufacturing in our district. https://t.co/u6XoKTWBYu
